title: 植物魔法魔力池与水冲突，求解决方案
author: 冉冉
txt_content:
本帖最后由 爱心魔王FHC 于 2020-7-22 10:07 编辑 

如题，自己做的整合包，原先是魔力池和空气冲突，朋友开了个小服又变成和水冲突了。。
下面放上崩溃报告


---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Daisy, daisy...

Time: 2020-07-19 10:07:16 CST
Description: Ticking block entity

java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Cannot get property PropertyEnum{name=variant, clazz=class vazkii.botania.api.state.enums.PoolVariant, values=[DEFAULT, CREATIVE, DILUTED, FABULOUS]} as it does not exist in BlockStateContainer{block=minecraft:water, properties=[level]}
